# Preface {.unnumbered}

Welcome to Field Study of Soils! This is a field-based course that teaches students how to describe soil profiles and associated landscape characteristics. With the exception of Monday, May 19th, class will be taught in the field all day, every day. All requirements for the course will be complete by Friday, May 30th. Students should be prepared to work outside in inclement weather.
